Proxy.name: PointLocator
Proxy.Documentation: Point locator based on a search structure of uniform fixed-resolution bins / buckets for point location and generic (zero or non-zero) tolerance point insertion.

IntVectorProperty.name: Divisions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the number of divisions in each axis / direction (x, y, z) for creating a search structure of uniform fixed-resolution bins / buckets.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfPointsPerBucket
IntVectorProperty.label: Number of points per bucket
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the average number of points in each bin / bucket that determines the initial and growing sizes (in terms of number of points) of each bin / bucket.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Tolerance
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify an absolute tolerance for check-based / tolerance-based point insertion.

Proxy.name: MergePoints
Proxy.label: Uniform Binning
Proxy.Documentation: A point merger using a search structure of uniform fixed-resolution bins / buckets for zero tolerance point insertion (to avoid exactly duplicate / coincident points).

IntVectorProperty.name: Divisions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the number of divisions in each axis / direction (x, y, z) for creating a search structure of uniform fixed-resolution bins / buckets.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfPointsPerBucket
IntVectorProperty.label: Number of points per bucket
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the average number of points in each bin / bucket that determines the initial and growing sizes (in terms of number of points) of each bin / bucket.

Proxy.name: NonMergingPointLocator
Proxy.label: Don't Merge Points
Proxy.Documentation: Perform direct / check-free point insertion (any point is inserted to a vtkPoints object) and therefore there can be duplicate points.

IntVectorProperty.name: Divisions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the number of divisions in each axis / direction (x, y, z) for creating a search structure of uniform fixed-resolution bins / buckets.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfPointsPerBucket
IntVectorProperty.label: Number of points per bucket
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the average number of points in each bin / bucket that determines the initial and growing sizes (in terms of number of points) of each bin / bucket.

Proxy.name: IncrementalOctreePointLocator
Proxy.Documentation: Point locator based on a fast search structure of data-aware multi-resolution octree nodes for point location and generic (zero or non-zero) tolerance point insertion.

IntVectorProperty.name: MaxPointsPerLeaf
IntVectorProperty.label: Max number of points per leaf
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the maximum number of points that a leaf node may maintain. This value is a trade-off between the cost of dynamic octree construction (top-down recursive node sub-division into eight children as points are incrementally inserted to the octree) and the speed of point location (particularly within a container leaf node).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Tolerance
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify an absolute tolerance for check-based / tolerance-based point insertion.

Proxy.name: IncrementalOctreeMergePoints
Proxy.label: Octree Binning
Proxy.Documentation: A point merger exploiting a fast search structure of data-aware multi-resolution octree nodes for zero-tolerance point insertion (to avoid exactly duplicate / coincident points).

IntVectorProperty.name: MaxPointsPerLeaf
IntVectorProperty.label: Max number of points per leaf
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the maximum number of points that a leaf node may maintain. This value is a trade-off between the cost of dynamic octree construction (top-down recursive node sub-division into eight children as points are incrementally inserted to the octree) and the speed of point location (particularly within a container leaf node).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Tolerance
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Always specify a zero tolerance for point insertion --- merging points.

Proxy.name: AnimationCueBase
Proxy.Documentation: Internal base interface for all animation cues.

IntVectorProperty.name: Enabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enables this animation cue.

ComparativeAnimationCueProxy.name: ComparativeAnimationCue
ComparativeAnimationCueProxy.Documentation: Animation cue used by comparative views.

IntVectorProperty.name: Enabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enables this animation cue.

Proxy.name: CameraAnimationCue
Proxy.Documentation: Animation cue which can be used for animating Camera using keyframes.

Proxy.name: TimeAnimationCue
Proxy.Documentation: This is same as KeyFrameAnimationCue except that it has a new property "UseAnimationTime" which when set overrides the keyframes all together and directly uses the animation clock time to update the animated property.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseAnimationTime
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When enabled, the animated property is directly updated with the value of the Animation clock. Default value it true.

ProxyProperty.name: ViewModules
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Add views to this scene. These are all the views that need to be updated when playing the animation.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: StartTime
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Start Time
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the start time for the animation scene.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: EndTime
DoubleVectorProperty.label: End Time
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the end time for the animation scene.

IntVectorProperty.name: LockStartTime
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set the StartTime will not be changed when the data time steps change.

IntVectorProperty.name: LockEndTime
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set the EndTime will not be changed when the data time steps change.

IntVectorProperty.name: Caching
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Indicates if cache is to be used while playing the animation.

ProxyProperty.name: TimeKeeper
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the time keeper. Time keeper is used to obtain the information about timesteps. This is required to play animation in "Snap To Timesteps" mode.

IntVectorProperty.name: Loop
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set to true to play the animation in a loop.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfFrames
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the number of frames in which to play the animation.

IntVectorProperty.name: Duration
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the duration for playing the animation in seconds.

IntVectorProperty.name: FramesPerTimestep
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The number of frames per timestep.

StringVectorProperty.name: ActiveFileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the filename whose information we need.

StringVectorProperty.name: WorkingDirectory
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Override the working directory used to resolve relative paths.

TimeKeeperProxy.name: TimeKeeper
TimeKeeperProxy.Documentation: TimeKeeper is used to keep the pipeline time for the application. All views added to the timekeeper show the same time as that on the time keeper.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimestepValues
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The timesteps currently available. This property does not have any information helper since vtkSMTimeKeeperProxy keeps this updated without any need to call UpdatePropertyInformation().

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimeRange
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This is the time range. It's possible that there are no TimestepValues but there is a valid TimeRange since some sources may provide continuous time.

ProxyProperty.name: Views
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Views with their view time linked with this time keeper.

ProxyProperty.name: TimeSources
ProxyProperty.Documentation: List of proxies that provide time. TimestepValues property has a set of timesteps provided by all the sources added to this property alone.

PluginLoaderProxy.name: PluginLoader
PluginLoaderProxy.Documentation: Use this proxy to load a plugin remotely. This proxy has no properties that users can set. Only information-properties are provided that can be used to obtain various states. vtkSMPluginLoaderProxy has API that can be used to load plugins, configuration xmls etc.

ProxyProperty.name: KdTree
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the KdTree managed by this manager.

ProxyProperty.name: Producers
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Producers/algorithms producing data that needs to be distributed.

ProxyProperty.name: StructuredProducer
ProxyProperty.Documentation: The optional producer whose partitioning is used to build the KdTree.

Proxy.name: RepresentationAnimationHelper
Proxy.Documentation: Used to help in animation representation properties.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: SelectionColor
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Selection
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Color used for showing selected cells/points.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: EdgeColor
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Edges
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Color used for showing selected cells/points.

Proxy.name: GlobalMapperProperties
Proxy.Documentation: This proxy is useful for changing gloabal mapper settings such as the coincident topology resolution setting on all rendering proceses.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: PolygonOffsetParameters
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Used to set the polygon offset scale factor and units. Used when ResolveCoincidentTopology is set to PolygonOffset. These are global variables.

IntVectorProperty.name: PolygonOffsetFaces
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Used when ResolveCoincidentTopology is set to PolygonOffset. The polygon offset can be applied either to the solid polygonal faces or the lines/vertices. When set (default), the offset is applied to the faces otherwise it is applied to lines and vertices. This is a global variable.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ZShift
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Used to set the z-shift if ResolveCoincidentTopology is set to ShiftZBuffer. This is a global variable.

IntVectorProperty.name: GlobalImmediateModeRendering
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Turn on/off flag to control whether data is rendered using immediate mode or note. Immediate mode rendering tends to be slower but it can handle larger datasets. The default value is immediate mode off. If you are having problems rendering a large dataset you might want to consider using immediate more rendering.

Proxy.name: GlobalAnimationProperties
Proxy.Documentation: Proxy used to update animation related settings on all processes.

IntVectorProperty.name: CacheLimit
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the cache limit in KiloBytes.

Proxy.name: TimerLog
Proxy.Documentation: This is a proxy used to control the timer log parameters on all processes. Note that since vtkTimerLog has loads of static ivar, most properties will affect all timer log instances.

Property.name: ResetLog
Property.Documentation: Resets the log on all processes.

IntVectorProperty.name: Enable
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enables the timer-log on all processes.

IntVectorProperty.name: MaxEntries
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the maximum length for the log on all processes.

RenderViewExporterProxy.name: X3DExporter
RenderViewExporterProxy.Documentation: vtkX3DExporter is a render window exporter which writes out the renderered scene into an X3D file. X3D is an XML-based format for representation 3D scenes (similar to VRML). Check out http://www.web3d.org/x3d/ for more details.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the file to be written.

IntVectorProperty.name: Binary
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Turn on binary mode

IntVectorProperty.name: Fastest
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: In binary mode use fastest instead of best compression.

RenderViewExporterProxy.name: VRMLExporter
RenderViewExporterProxy.Documentation: Exporter to export a single render view to an VRML file.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the file to be written.

CSVExporterProxy.name: CSVExporter
CSVExporterProxy.Documentation: Exporter to export a single render view to an CSV file.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the file to be written.

RenderViewExporterProxy.name: POVExporter
RenderViewExporterProxy.Documentation: vtkPOVExporter is a render window exporter which writes out the renderered scene into an POV Ray file.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the file to be written.

Proxy.name: PointPlacerBase
Proxy.Documentation: Base API definition for all point placers.

Proxy.name: ContourLineInterpolatorBase
Proxy.Documentation: Base API definition for all contour line interpolators.
